subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Flirting with his American record before falling off the pace, Michael Phelps cruised to an 8.68-second victory in the 400-yard individual medley at the Southern California Grand Prix meet Sunday night in Long Beach, Calif.Phelps touched first in 3 minutes 38.28 seconds — 2.02 seconds off his American mark, set in 2006.Amanda Beard, seeking to make her fourth Olympic team at 26, finished third in the 200 breaststroke. It was Beard’s first meet since November, when she swam a smaller competition in Seattle.
